body_html: Ok, that's great news! But I don't think OpenMP does anything to vectorize log or exp. I have never seen it do that to other parts of our code, so some extra speedups might be very easy to achieve.
body_text: Ok, that's great news! But I don't think OpenMP does anything to vectorize log or exp. I have never seen it do that to other parts of our code, so some extra speedups might be very easy to achieve.
body: Ok, that's great news! But I don't think OpenMP does anything to vectorize `log` or `exp`. I have never seen it do that to other parts of our code, so some extra speedups might be very easy to achieve.
